content:
I'd be happy to help you create a to-do list for the week leading up to the party. Here's a suggested list to get you started:

**Monday:**

* Confirm the party details with Mike (date, time, location, dress code, etc.)
* Make a list of what you need to bring (Spinach and Artichoke Dip, drinks, etc.)
* Check your schedule for any conflicts or appointments that might affect your party prep

**Tuesday:**

* Buy ingredients for the Spinach and Artichoke Dip (check your pantry first to avoid duplicates)
* Shop for any other items you want to bring to the party (drinks, snacks, etc.)

**Wednesday:**

* Prepare the Spinach and Artichoke Dip (or at least prep the ingredients)
* Consider making a few extra snacks or treats to bring to the party

**Thursday:**

* Finalize your outfit and accessories for the party
* Charge your phone and make sure you have a portable charger (just in case)

**Friday:**

* Finish preparing the Spinach and Artichoke Dip (if you haven't already)
* Pack everything you need to bring to the party (dip, drinks, snacks, etc.)

**Saturday (party day!):**

* Double-check the party details and directions to Mike's place
* Leave early to account for traffic or parking issues
* Bring everything you need and have a great time!

Feel free to add or modify items on this list based on your specific needs and preferences. You can also use this list as a starting point and add reminders to your calendar or phone to stay on track.

Hope this helps, and have a blast at the party!
